sections.heading: traffic violations; pretrial diversion program; eligibility
sections.text: Any driver holding a commercial driver's license or CLP-commercial learner's permit issued pursuant to the Motor Vehicle Operator's License Act shall not be eligible to participate in a program under sections 29-3605 to 29-3609 if such part

29-3608.Minor traffic violations; pretrial diversion program; eligibility.

Any driver holding a commercial driver's license or CLP-commercial learner's permit issued pursuant to the Motor Vehicle Operator's License Act shall not be eligible to participate in a program under sections 29-3605 to 29-3609 if such participation would be in noncompliance with federal law or regulation and subject the state to possible loss of federal funds.

SourceLaws 2002, LB 1303, § 8;Laws 2003, LB 562, § 1;Laws 2005, LB 76, § 1;Laws 2011, LB178, § 1;Laws 2014, LB983, § 1.

Cross ReferencesMotor Vehicle Operator's License Act, see section 60-462.
